front.title: The Processing of Isolation and Interconnection between Multiple Customer VLANs in VPLS VPN

abstract.t: This document decribes a method of using Customer VLANs to isolate internal users and the interconnection between Multiple Customer VLANs in a VPLS VPN. It extends and is compatible with the existing VPLS MAC learning and forwarding mechanism [RFC4664], [RFC4762].
